ROW.PDT: *IF ( ( *VALUE Process.Command_U *EQ 'pbcupscomm' *AND *VALUE Process.Size *GE 1500000 ) *OR ( *VALUE Process.Command_U *EQ 'pbfdccomm' *AND *VALUE Process.Size *GE 1500000 ) *OR ( *VALUE Process.Command_U *EQ 'pbsyncpermcomm' *AND *VALUE Process.Size *GE 1500000 ) *OR ( *VALUE Process.Command_U *EQ 'pbsynctermcomm' *AND *VALUE Process.Size *GE 1500000 ) *OR ( *VALUE Process.Command_U *EQ 'pbasyscomm' *AND *VALUE Process.Size *GE 1500000 ) )
ROW.TEXT: 命令包含'pb'，大小（KB）大于等于1500000";7*24;1
